item.title: CIQ Development With VSCode - The Gotchas
item.author: Author
item.description: The Connect IQ Eclipse Plugin is dead! Long live the Connect IQ Eclipse Plugin! It has been about 5 months since Garmin held their annual developer conference, during which there was an entire breakout session for Connect IQ tools, including the all singing, all dancing, Visual Studio Code extension. Drinking the Kool-Aid, one would have thought Garmin had lowered the barrier to entry for development on the CIQ platform, in their own words
